title: Identify the Oxidation Process
text: In a redox reaction, oxidation refers to the loss of electrons. Look at the changes in oxidation states of the elements involved.

title: Determine the Oxidation States
text: Determine the initial and final oxidation states of Al and Ag in the reaction. Which element's oxidation state increases?

title: Calculate Oxidation State of Al
text: Al starts as a solid metal with an oxidation state of $$0$$. What is its oxidation state in Al3+?

title: Calculate Oxidation State of Ag
text: Ag+ starts with an oxidation state of $$+1$$. What is its oxidation state in Ag(s)?

title: Identify the Element that Loses Electrons
text: The element that loses electrons is oxidized. Compare the changes in oxidation states for Al and Ag.

title: Which Element is Oxidized?
text: Based on the changes in oxidation states, which element loses electrons?
